publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1487# Pauline McNeill: Patient Care-That the Parliament believes that patients should have more say in their health care; notes that patients waiting for treatment can find it difficult to get information and often face intimidating attitudes from those in authority in the system and that this often results in patients giving up challenging the system, and believes that a new system should be introduced in which patients are allocated a specific professional member of staff to see them right through the system of care.
S1M-1487# Patient Care (lodged on 19 December 2000) Mr Jamie Stone*

S1M-1487# Pauline McNeill: Patient Care—That the Parliament believes that patients should have more say in their health care; notes that patients waiting for treatment can find it difficult to get information and often face intimidating attitudes from those in authority in the system and that this often results in patients giving up challenging the system, and believes that a new system should be introduced in which patients are allocated a specific professional member of staff to see them right through the system of care. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone
S1M-1487# Patient Care (lodged on 19 December 2000) Donald Gorrie*, Irene Oldfather*, Ms Sandra White*, Scott Barrie*
S1M-1487# Patient Care (lodged on 19 December 2000) Tommy Sheridan*

S1M-1487# Pauline McNeill: Patient Care—That the Parliament believes that patients should have more say in their health care; notes that patients waiting for treatment can find it difficult to get information and often face intimidating attitudes from those in authority in the system and that this often results in patients giving up challenging the system, and believes that a new system should be introduced in which patients are allocated a specific professional member of staff to see them right through the system of care. Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Donald Gorrie, Irene Oldfather, Ms Sandra White, Scott Barrie, Tommy Sheridan
S1M-1487# Patient Care (lodged on 19 December 2000) Cathy Jamieson*, Mary Scanlon*, Johann Lamont*
S1M-1487# Patient Care (lodged on 19 December 2000) Cathy Peattie*

Supported by: Mr Jamie Stone, Donald Gorrie, Irene Oldfather, Ms Sandra White, Scott Barrie, Tommy Sheridan, Cathy Jamieson, Mary Scanlon, Johann Lamont, Cathy Peattie
